description: Brighton: What did you make of US tour? Have your say
title: What did you make of US tour?
title_page: Brighton: What did you make of US tour? Have your say - BBC Sport
maintext:
So it was a victory and two defeats for Brighton, who concluded their Premier League Summer Series in the United States with a 2-1 loss to Newcastle United.
Head coach Roberto de Zerbi took the positives from the trip across the Atlantic and has said there is a "great atmosphere" within the Seagulls' squad.
